translation.en: It seems strange now,
but remember when Ninjago was the only thing on the map?
When it was our entire world?
I used to spend all my time trying to be like my heroes, the Ninja.
translation.es: Pasaba el tiempo intentando ser como mis héroes, los ninjas.

translation.en: Practicing their moves, learning their poses...
translation.es: Practicaba sus técnicas y sus poses.

translation.en: I wanted to be just like them. To protect everyone in Ninjago.
translation.es: Quería ser como ellos para proteger a todos en Ninjago.

translation.en: To ride dragons into adventure and mythical realms.
translation.es: Para montar dragones hacia reinos mitológicos,

translation.en: Mysterious lands that could only exist in legend.
translation.es: tierras míticas que solo existen en leyendas.

translation.en: But I quickly found out those legendary realms are very real.
translation.es: Y pronto descubrí que esos reinos son reales.

translation.en: And I was about to lose everyone that was important to me.
translation.es: Iba a perder a mis seres queridos.

translation.en: My neighborhood must have been the very center of The Merge.
translation.es: Mi vecindario resultó ser el centro de la fusión.

translation.en: But back then, we didn't know what to call it.
- - It was just chaos.
Arin, get inside! It's too dangerous out there!
- Arin! -
That's when my heroes, the Ninja, arrived!
translation.es: Y llegaron mis héroes, los ninjas.

translation.en: We were in so much danger, but I couldn't help but be excited.
translation.es: Corríamos mucho peligro, pero me emocioné igual.

translation.en: Hey, kid, you get lost?
Jay, the Lightning Ninja!
Kai, Fire Ninja!
Cole, Earth Ninja!
Zane, Ice Ninja.
Nya, Water Ninja!
Lloyd, the Legendary Green Ninja!
Hold on, kid.
Green Ninja, my parents are in that storm! You gotta save them!
translation.es: Mis padres están en la tormenta. Sálvalos.

translation.en: That's what we're here for!
And that's when it happened.
As I saw my small neighborhood disappear and a new city show up on the horizon,
translation.es: Cuando vi que mi vecindario desapareció y vi la nueva ciudad a lo lejos,

translation.en: I realized I had witnessed The Merge firsthand.
translation.es: comprendí que había visto la fusión.

translation.en: The moment all the mysterious realms I had only heard about, merged with Ninjago,
translation.es: El momento en que todos los reinos se fusionaron en Ninjago

translation.en: for reasons no one's been able to figure out.
translation.es: por razones que nadie pudo descubrir.

translation.en: I survived, but I was alone.
My parents and everyone I ever knew had vanished.
translation.es: Mis padres y mis conocidos habían desaparecido.

translation.en: Mom? Dad?
With my parents and home gone, I had to make a new life for myself.
translation.es: Al quedarme sin padres y sin casa, emprendí una nueva vida.

translation.en: Before, everyone I knew looked like me.
translation.es: Antes todos se parecían a mí.

translation.en: Now I walk the streets with skeleton people,
buy food from snail people, sell pies to frog people!
translation.es: gente caracol me vende comida, gente rana me compra pasteles.

translation.en: And since the Ninja disappeared,
I realized it's up to me to carry on their legendary tradition.
translation.es: de mí depende continuar con su legado.

translation.en: Arin, not to insult the dreams of my best new friend, but...
translation.es: Arin, no quiero insultar tus sueños,

translation.en: you are so not a Ninja.
How would you know, Sora? You didn't grow up with them like I did.
translation.es: ¿Cómo sabes, Sora? No creciste con ellos como yo.

translation.en: All I need is a master to train me.
Sure! Ah, one problem.
There are no Ninja Masters around anymore.
Hey, have you found what we need yet?
I can only distract these dogs from making noise for so long.
translation.es: No podré distraerlos por mucho tiempo.

translation.en: Uh, I don't have that many stories to tell.
Give me a second.
Boom! And we didn't even set off the...
Halt! Halt! Halt!
We should probably leave right about now.
I always like how you think.
Oh, there's gotta be an easier way to get mechanical parts!
There is. It's called having money.
translation.es: Sí. Con dinero, pero no lo tenemos.

translation.en: Which is not exactly our situation.
translation.es: Con dinero, pero no lo tenemos.

translation.en: After tomorrow it might be!
Halt! Halt! Halt!
All right, then. Ninja...
- You're not a ninja. - Wannabe Ninja...
translation.es: - No eres un ninja. - Posible ninja…

translation.en: Go!
Rough landing. But you're getting better at that.
- - Let's go!
Can you make a distraction?
I don't think these bots want to hear my story about the Merge.
translation.es: No querrán oír mi historia de la fusión.

translation.en: Then do something else!
Up here!
You, garbage can!
Dance! Dance! Dance! Dance! Dance! Dance!
I will never get over how quickly you can hack stuff like that.
translation.es: Me sorprende lo rápida que eres hackeando.

translation.en: What can I say? I'm just naturally good at tech stuff.
translation.es: Sí, soy muy buena con la tecnología.

translation.en: It's been like that since I was a kid.
We might not have money, but I'm sure the owners of this place would love
translation.es: No hay dinero, pero a los dueños de este sitio

translation.en: one of my delicious homemade pies, right?
translation.es: les gustará uno de mis pasteles, ¿no?

translation.en: As payment for the gear we're borrowing.
translation.es: En pago de lo que nos llevamos.

translation.en: Who doesn't love pie?
Dance! Dance! Dance!
- Hey, Mrs. R. - How's the wasp milk today?
Ooh, watch your step, Newt.
Hey! Watch where you're going!
I still can't get over how amazing the Kingdom of Imperium looks.
translation.es: No puedo creer lo increíble que es el Reino Imperium.

translation.en: It's perfect, isn't it?
Don't believe everything you hear about Imperium.
translation.es: No creas todo lo que se dice.

translation.en: I'm from there, remember?
Their idea of perfect isn't mine.
translation.es: Su idea de perfección no es la mía.

translation.en: The Merge slamming it up against Ninjago gave me the perfect chance to get out.
translation.es: La fusión que golpeó Ninjago me permitió escapar.

translation.en: And the perfect chance to meet me.
I'd still like to go there someday.
Or go anywhere.
I've never been out of my old neighborhood.
Crossroads just grew up around the area where my house used to be.
translation.es: El Cruce rodeaba la casa donde me crie.

translation.en: You want to experience other places? Look around!
Why go anywhere when the best of all the realms have moved here to the Crossroads?
translation.es: ¿Por qué ir a otro lugar cuando lo mejor está en el Cruce?

translation.en: For example, me.
I'm glad you came here, Sora.
You're my BFF, my fam, but...
some of us are only here because we had nowhere else to go.
translation.es: pero algunos estamos aquí porque no hay adónde ir.

translation.en: I understand, but you have to admit,
having our own penthouse is pretty cool.
translation.es: que tener nuestro piso es genial.

translation.en: Race you to the top!
Last one there's a rotten egg!
- Hey, that's cheating! - See you!
- Wouldn't wanna be you! - Careful, Arin,
- you're going too... -
- Dang it! - ...fast.
Yes! SA- Mark- 1 is gonna crush in the Mech- Master 5,000!
Tomorrow's race is the biggest prize pot of all time.
translation.es: La carrera de mañana tiene un gran premio.

translation.en: - If we win... - When we win.
Right, right, when we win, we could find ourselves a real place to live.
translation.es: Cuando ganemos, podríamos buscar un buen lugar donde vivir.

translation.en: I could build my own Monastery and invite everyone else who lost their parents to live with us.
translation.es: Construiré mi monasterio y podrán vivir los que quedaron huérfanos.

translation.en: To carry on the tradition of the Ninja!
And I could design a real garage and lab.
translation.es: Diseñaré un garaje y un laboratorio.

translation.en: And we wouldn't have to pay for parts with your pies anymore.
translation.es: Y no pagaremos las piezas con pasteles.

translation.en: Another earthquake? It seems like they're happening more often.
They never happened at all before the Merge.
translation.es: No pasaba antes de la fusión.

translation.en: Hey, do you ever wonder if there's a greater purpose
for all of this? Like, a reason for the Merge?
translation.es: ¿Tendrán algún motivo superior? Por ejemplo, para la fusión.

translation.en: The Merge might have taken away everything you had, Arin, but it's given me everything I have.
translation.es: La fusión podrá haberte quitado todo, pero me dio lo que tengo.

translation.en: Change can be scary.
But it's also a chance for something better.
The capture was successful?
Of course! Transfer will begin first thing in the morning.
Your overconfidence is a weakness, Rapton.
translation.es: Tu confianza es una debilidad, Rapton.

translation.en: These creatures are dangerous.
Trust me, this thing isn't going anywhere.
translation.es: Créame. Eso no irá a ningún lado.

translation.en: Don't worry, Lord Ras.
Do not disappoint me.
Lord Ras doesn't sound like he's got a lot of faith in us.
translation.es: Lord Ras no nos tiene confianza.

translation.en: He's too uptight. We're the best there is at rounding up these animals.
translation.es: Es intolerante. Somos geniales capturando esos animales.

translation.en: Ugh, your overconfidence is a weakness.
Let me tell you, I've never even heard the word weakness.
translation.es: Yo jamás escuché la palabra debilidad.

translation.en: Really? It's a pretty common word.
No. I... I mean, I just don't know what that word means.
Seriously? I... I can explain. Weakness, noun, the quality of...
translation.es: ¿En serio? Puedo explicarlo. Debilidad, sustantivo, calidad de…

translation.en: - - Go away.
This guy in here? He ain't goin' nowhere, ain't ya?
translation.es: Pero este muchachito no irá a ninguna parte, ¿no?

translation.en: The last call to register for the Mech- Master 5000!
translation.es: ¡Última llamada para registrarse para el Meca-Master 5000!

translation.en: The greatest race...
In the history of the Crossroads.
And we're here to win it!
Sora! Arin! Always happy to peep you two wild scamps.
Up top!
Good to see you too, Mr. Frohicky.
Wait. That's your mech?
No offense, Sora, but, uh, not one of your more impressive builds, is it, hmm?
translation.es: No te ofendas, pero no es una de tus mejores creaciones, ¿cierto?

translation.en: It's easily underestimated. Just like us.
Sure, but I've got top mechs from around the merged realms here.
translation.es: Sí, pero tengo excelentes mecas de todos los reinos fusionados.

translation.en: Like an Underworld Mech.
Freaky Leapy.
There's even a... uh, uh...
...that thing.
Lobbo- lobbo.
Oh, that's Lobbo! He's a good guy.
translation.es: Ese es Lobbo. Me cae bien.

translation.en: But, uh, never ask him about his mom. It's a... it's a very touchy subject.
translation.es: Pero no le pregunten por su mamá. Es un tema delicado.

translation.en: Plus, all the regulars.
It could get pretty vicious. Maybe you should sit today's race out?
translation.es: Podría ser violento. No deberían participar de la carrera.

translation.en: Fine. Then ante up!
I know you're not trying to pay your registration fees
translation.es: Sé que no quieren pagar la inscripción

translation.en: with baked goods again.
So you don't want a fresh pie filled with roasted snow- berries from the Never- Realm?
translation.es: ¿No quieres un pastel con moras del Reino del Jamás?

translation.en: Fine. I guess we'll just have to toss it. Maybe the dogs are hungry.
translation.es: Tendremos que tirarlo. Quizá los perros tengan hambre.

translation.en: Or maybe the raccoons?
Well, it'd be a shame to just throw it out.
Fine.  Line up.
Ha! They'll let anyone into these races, won't they?
translation.es: Anotan a cualquiera en estas carreras, ¿no?

translation.en: At least we build our own gear, Kreel.
We don't have a team of servants doing the work for us.
They aren't servants! They're friend- ish people who work for me.
translation.es: No son sirvientes. Son amigos que trabajan para mí.

translation.en: They're here to cheer when I crush you! Like last time.
translation.es: Me aplaudirán cuando los aplaste como la otra vez.

translation.en: And the time before, and, checks notes...  Every single time.
translation.es: Y la anterior y déjame ver… Todas las demás.

translation.en: You kids don't learn.
Oh, we learn. But we just don't give up.
And I might've designed a bit of an upgrade since the last race.
translation.es: Y le hice algunas mejoras desde la última carrera.

translation.en: Come on, Arin. Let's get our fuel couplings attached
translation.es: Arin, vamos por los acoples de combustible

translation.en: while Kreel contemplates her impending loss.
I'm not worried.
But just in case, loosen their cooling cable while they're gone.
translation.es: Por las dudas, aflojen el cable de refrigeración.

translation.en: When they hit their turboboost, their engine will overheat and explode.
translation.es: Cuando activen el turbo, el motor se calentará y estallará.

translation.en: Hey! Settle down in there!
Nice try, you animal.
You can't...
After that thing!
Are we winning? I can't see. Tell me we are winning!
Not yet. Get the bumper arms up.
Lobbo on the move. Lobbo- lobbo!
We're coming for you, you fancy hatted ego- maniac.
Hold on!
Lobbo avoids hazards. Lobbo- lobbo.
Hit the turboboost!
No! We can only use it once! Saving it for when we really need it.
translation.es: Solo se usa una vez. Lo usaremos si hace falta.

translation.en: Those punks? Oh, no, they don't.
We're in the straightaway. This has got to be the time to use the turboboost, right?
translation.es: Es la recta final. Debemos activar el turbo, ¿no crees?

translation.en: - Right? - Yep! Get ready to roll around in prize money, tossing it in the air and going Whee- hee!
translation.es: Sí, ganaremos el dinero y lo lanzaremos por el aire.

translation.en: Sora, go! We're so close! We gotta go after that dragon.
What? We need to win this race!
Those dragon hunters are the Claws of Imperium!
translation.es: Esos cazadragones son las Garras de Imperium.

translation.en: If they catch that dragon...  ...the things they'll do to him.
Trust me, we have to stop them.
Arin! What would the Ninja do?
Let's save that dragon.
- Get up! Get up! - Lobbo- lobbo.
Lobbo wins!
Lobbo a success. See, Lobbo's mother?
Can a malfunctioning tin can do that?
Lobbo- lobbo.
No need to tell Ras about this minor slip up, understood?
translation.es: No le cuentes a Ras sobre este error, ¿oíste?

translation.en: Hop on, buddy!
What? Who are these kids now? Get them!
Uh, looks like we're in another race.
Then good thing we've still got that turboboost ready to go.
Uh, did one of us make that thing explode?
I mean...  I'm sure it was us, right?
Dragons are resilient. Our target will survive.
translation.es: Los dragones son fuertes. Estará bien.

translation.en: Those kids, not so much.
Let's get down there and drag the lizard off the pavement.
That's different than it was before, right?
How did you do all this?
I honestly do not know. But now's not the time for questions.
translation.es: Realmente, no lo sé, pero no es hora de preguntas.

translation.en: It's the time for...
Now it's my turn!
Self- trained Wannabe Ninja without a master, go!
Oh. Close enough.
Lord Ras, we were just about to...
You failed me. I do not like that.
translation.es: Me fallaste, y no me gusta.

translation.en: Uh, do you know who this guy is?
- No clue. - He doesn't seem very nice.
What? How'd you...
Arin!
You are just the first.
Now, I'm going to hunt down your entire family.
translation.es: Ahora voy a cazar a toda tu familia.

translation.en: Wherever they are.
Put the prisoners on the train. Quickly!
translation.es: Sube a los prisioneros al tren.

translation.en: I trust you won't have any more problems.
translation.es: Espero que no tengan más problemas.

translation.en: Yes, Lord Ras. I mean, no, Lord Ras.
translation.es: Sí, Lord Ras. Digo, no, Lord Ras.

translation.en: What do you think they'll do to us?
Whatever it is, they'll do worse to that dragon. Really?
translation.es: - No sé, pero al dragón le irá peor. - ¿En serio?

translation.en: The Claws of the Imperium come from Imperium, same as me.
translation.es: Las Garras de Imperium son de Imperium como yo.

translation.en: And Imperium runs entirely on dragon power.
translation.es: Imperium se alimenta de la energía de los dragones.

translation.en: With all these merged realms, I'm sure they're hunting dragons everywhere now.
translation.es: Al fusionarse tantos reinos, deben cazar muchos dragones.

translation.en: But they say dragon power is safe.
translation.es: Dicen que su energía es segura.

translation.en: Safe for who?
You saw the look in that dragon's eyes. It wanted to be free.
translation.es: Ya viste la mirada de ese dragón. Quería ser libre.

translation.en: Just like I did.
So, uh, I've known you for a while now, and you've always been pretty good with tech, but...
translation.es: Te conozco desde hace mucho, y eres buena con la tecnología, pero…

translation.en: I have no idea.
You turned pieces of the SA- Mark- 1 into a flying mech, in midair!
translation.es: Transformaste piezas del SA-Mark-1 en un meca volador en pleno vuelo.

translation.en: Yeah. That was weird, right?
Well, that's one word for it.
Other words would be amazing, impossible, defying all logic or reason!
translation.es: Pero también increíble, imposible, fuera de toda lógica.

translation.en: It was that dragon.
I could feel it awaken something in me.
translation.es: Sentí que despertó algo en mí.

translation.en: Some kind of power.
Like the Elemental Powers the Ninja had!
translation.es: Como los poderes elementales de los ninjas.

translation.en: Powers I've dreamed of having. Water, fire, ice.
translation.es: Los que siempre soñé tener: agua, fuego, hielo…

translation.en: Not everything is tied to your lost heroes, you know.
translation.es: No todo se relaciona con tus héroes.

translation.en: If I lose hope that the Ninja could come back,
translation.es: Si pierdo la esperanza de que vuelvan,

translation.en: then I lose hope my parents could come back.
translation.es: perderé la ilusión de ver a mis padres.

translation.en: Hope is the only thing the Merge didn't take from me.
translation.es: La fusión no solo me quitó la esperanza.

translation.en: Well, hope won't be enough anymore.
translation.es: La esperanza ya no será suficiente.

translation.en: We can't build you a new Ninja Monastery from an Imperium prison.
translation.es: No haremos tu monasterio encerrados en Imperium.

translation.en: It's called the Monastery of Spinjitzu.
But you're right. The dream's over, isn't it?
translation.es: Pero tienes razón. - Adiós a mi sueño. - ¡Oye! ¿Qué…?

translation.en: Wait. Aren't you... No way!
The Green Ninja.
I think that mask belongs to me.
translation.es: Creo que esa máscara es mía.
